title: John Convertino on Rumble Fish
itunes:title: John Convertino on Rumble Fish
description:
So far Chuck has spoken with comedians, actors, authors, podcasters and singers. This week he gets his first drummer in the studio and had a great conversation with John Convertino of Calexico. Not only is John a great drummer in one of Chuck's favorite bands, but he's a nice guy with a lot of insight on movies, film scoring and life in general. Join Chuck and John today as they crush out on Francis Ford Coppola's 1983 classic Rumble Fish. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
